Booking System open in new window

Complex events made simple

All you need to know about getting your events up and running on Solidrock

How it works →

Simple Pricing

Per paid ticket fee. Running a free event? We'll share the love and power your event for free.

Integrated Payments

We don't hold your finances hostage. As soon as the customer has paid for their order, you'll receive the funds directly into your Stripe account.

Manage 1,000s

Create and manage teams to help make your event happen. Provide discounts and perks to your teams. Choose what access each team gets at the event.
